import React,{useState}from"react";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{addTodo,deleteTodo,editTodo}from"./actions";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const todos=useSelector(state=>state.todos);const dispatch=useDispatch();const[text,setText]=useState("");const[editIndex,setEditIndex]=useState(null);const handleAddTodo=()=>{if(text.trim()!==""){if(editIndex!==null){dispatch(editTodo(editIndex,text));setEditIndex(null);}else{dispatch(addTodo(text));}setText("");}};const handleEditTodo=(index,todo)=>{setText(todo);setEditIndex(index);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Todo App using Redux"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter a new task..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-button",onClick:handleAddTodo,children:editIndex!==null?"Edit":"Add"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"todo-list",children:todos.map((todo,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"todo-item",children:[editIndex===index?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:text// Set the value to the current todo text
,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"todo-text",children:todo.todo}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"button-container",children:editIndex===index?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"save-button",onClick:()=>{dispatch(editTodo(index,text));setEditIndex(null);setText("");},children:"Save"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cancel-button",onClick:()=>{setEditIndex(null);setText("");},children:"Cancel"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"edit-button",onClick:()=>handleEditTodo(index,todo.todo),children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-button",onClick:()=>dispatch(deleteTodo(index)),children:"Delete"})]})})]},index))})]});}export default App;
